 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעַט‎</span>] **verb** ==be or become small, diminished, few== (Late Hebrew, Talmud, ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***to be without hair on the body***) — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְעַט‎</span> [[Exod.12.4|Exod 12:4]], 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְעָ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Jer.29.6|Jer 29:6]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְעָ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Isa.21.17|Isa 21:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְעֲטוּ‎</span> [[Ps.107.39|Ps 107:39]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֹט‎</span> [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] — [[Exod.12.4|Exod 12:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִסיִֿמְעַט הַבַּיִת מִהְיוֺת מִשֶּׂה‎</span> if the house be ***too small*** for a lamb; [[Neh.9.32|Neh 9:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַליִֿמְעַט לְפָנֶיךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת כָּלהַֿתְּלָאָה‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:117l»§ 117l</sup>); of a people, [[Jer.29.6|Jer 29:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְבוּ שָׁם וְאַלתִּֿמְעָ֑טוּ‎</span> and ***become*** not ***few***, [[Jer.30.19|Jer 30:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִרְבִּתִים וְלֹא יִמְעָ֔טוּ‎</span>, [[Isa.21.17|Isa 21:17]]; [[Ps.107.39|Ps 107:39]]; [[Prov.13.11|Prov 13:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺן מֵהֶבֶל יִמְעָ֑ט‎</span> ***diminishes*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְבֶּה‎</span>); [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְפִי מְעֹט הַשָּׁנִים‎</span> according to the ***fewness*** of the years. **Pi\`el** ***become few*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:52k»§ 52k</sup>), ***Perfect*** 3 plural [[Eccl.12.3|Eccl 12:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבָֽטְלוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַטֹּחֲנוֺת כִּי מִעֵ֔טוּ‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִמְעִ֫יטָה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:49k»§ 49k</sup>), [[Lev.26.22|Lev 26:22]], 1 singular with suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִמְעַטְתִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.29.15|Ezek 29:15]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְעִיט‎</span> [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְעִטֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Jer.10.34|Jer 10:34]], 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְעִ֫יטִי‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.3|2Kgs 4:3]], etc.; — ***make small*** or ***few, diminish:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Lev.26.22|Lev 26:22]] (of the sword) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִמְעִ֫יטָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתְכֶם‎</span>, [[Ezek.29.15|Ezek 29:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִמְעַטְתִּים‎</span>, [[Jer.10.24|Jer 10:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלבְּֿאַפְּךָ פֶּןֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְעִטֵנִי‎</span> lest thou ***make me*** (the people) ***small***, [[Ps.107.38|Ps 107:38]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְהֶמְתָּם לֹא יַמְעִיט‎</span>; [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְפִי מְעֹט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁנִים תַּמְעִיט מִקְנָתוֺ‎</span> according to the smallness (fewness) of the years, thou shalt ***make small*** its price, [[Num.26.54|Num 26:54]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָרַב תַּרְבֶּה נַחֲלָתוֺ וְלַמְעַט תַּמְעִיט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלָתוֺ‎</span> and to the small (few) thou shalt ***make small*** his inheritance (so [[Num.33.54|Num 33:54]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** qualifying an ***action*** (sometimes to be understood from the context), [[Exod.16.17|Exod 16:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלְקְטוּ הַמַּרְבֶּה וְהַמַּמְעִיט‎</span> and they gathered, he that made much, and he that ***made little*** (that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִלְקֹט‎</span>), v[[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]]; [[Num.11.32|Num 11:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׂרה חמרים הממעיט אסף‎</span>, [[2Kgs.4.3|2Kgs 4:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּלִים רֵקִים אַלתַּֿמְעִיטִי‎</span> empty vessels ***make not few*** (that is, in borrowing); [[Exod.30.15|Exod 30:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעָשִׁיר לֹא יַרְבֶּה וְהַדַּל לֹא יַמְעִיט מִמַּחֲצִית הַשָּׁ֑קֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָתֵת וגו‎</span> ***shall not diminish*** from the half shekel to give, i.e. shall not give less, [[Num.35.8|Num 35:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֵת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרַב תַּרְבּוּ וּמֵאֵת הַמְעַט תַּמְעִיטוּ‎</span> and from the few ye shall ***make few*** (that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָתֵת‎</span>), i.e. ye shall give few (cities).
